name: Balder, Light God of the White Heaven
text:
Break: Choose a [Race:Deity] dark attribute resonator with total cost 4 or less in your graveyard and put it into your hand.
While this card is a summon spell, players cannot chase.
Enter: Remove target dark attribute resonator in your opponent's field. Players cannot chase this Enter:.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
